## ğŸ’¬ Community Support

### GitHub Issues

If you've found a bug or have a feature request, please [open an issue](https://github.com/your-repo/schoolmanagement/issues). Please use the appropriate template:
- [Bug Report](ISSUE_TEMPLATE/bug_report.md)
- [Feature Request](ISSUE_TEMPLATE/feature_request.md)

### Discussions

For general questions, design discussions, or sharing your ideas, please use [GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/your-repo/schoolmanagement/discussions).
